body.p: The WebHelp Responsive output can be customized through the available transformation parameters.

Categories:
Parameters that control the transformation process
Configure how the resources are processed
Configure XML Parser caching
Enable/disable memory conservation
DITA sources processing mode
Temporary files storage type
XSLT style-sheets reload mode
Parameters that control the output
Add custom logo and favicon
Show / hide components: tiles, publication TOC, topic TOC, child links, related links, navigation links, collapsible sections, changes and comments, index terms link, breadcrumb, toggle search highlights button, print button
Configure components
Display a link to the PDF variant of the current publication
Configure the set of links generated in the Publication TOC
Menu depth and menu activation mode
Related links grouping mode
Configure various aspects of the topic content:
Table and figure title placement
generate headings for sections within task topics
Configure how table and cross references are generated
The initial state of topic collapsible sections
Configure built-in search engine
Exclude certain files from indexing
Customize stop-words
Enable/disable stemming
Configure pagination of displayed search results items
Enable / disable search query auto completion in search field
Replace built-in search engine with a custom one
Use Google search engine
Use custom search engine implementation
Configure generated site-map
